Wheaton.Milton Township, DuPage County, Illinois:
Milton Township is one of nine townships in DuPage County, Illinois, USA. As of the 2010 census, its population was 117,067 and it contained 45,153 housing units.


== Geography ==
According to the 2010 census, the township has a total area of 35.27 square miles (91.3 km2), of which 34.36 square miles (89.0 km2) (or 97.42%) is land and 0.92 square miles (2.4 km2) (or 2.61%) is water.

=== Cemeteries ===
The township contains these five cemeteries:
Forest Hill,
Pleasant Hill,
Saint Michaels Catholic,
Saint Stephens German Catholic
and Wheaton.
